        public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        on-Upgrade method. Drops all tables and runs on-Create again if database version is changed.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - the database object to be upgraded
        oldVersion - the old version number
        newVersion - the new version number
